node.title: Haven-X Disbands Following Graduation of Its Talents
node.description: VTuber agency Haven-X has announced on Twitter that their talents Koa Himari and Viri Sylvaine have graduated as of August 17, 2022. YouTube memberships for all talents will be closed by October 31.
